oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Johnson Brothers Radio Show - WAVU - Tape 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording is of the Johnson Brothers Radio Show for the WAVU radio station of Albertville, Alabama. Tape is labeled part one of six tapes. The recording comes from January 10,1953.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Johnson Brothers String Band
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Ras Johnson opens with a guitar tune while Jesse Culp discusses the Sand Mountain Truck and Tractor Company -- (01:49) Sally Goodin' (Johnson Brothers String Band) -- (01:26) Ras introduces "Sally Goodin" -- (01:46) Sally Goodin' (Johnson Brothers String Band) -- (03:22) Fiddler's Dram (Johnson Brothers String Band) -- (04:50) Ras invites Culp to perform his commercial spot for the Sand Mountain Truck and Tractor Company -- (07:34) Where the Soul Never Dies (Johnson Brothers String Band) -- (09:43) Oh My Little Boy She's Foolin' You (Johnson Brothers String Band) -- (12:09) Silver Bells (Johnson Brothers String Band) -- (14:21) Mollie Put the Kettle on (Johnson Brothers String Band) -- (15:05) Culp discusses the Sand Mountain Truck and Tractor Company atop of Johnson Brother's String Band backing -- (17:27) Time (Imogene and Ella Johnson) -- (20:08) Some of Them Gals Will Do to Take Along (Johnson Brothers String Band) -- (22:56) Down Yonder (Imogene and Ella Johnson) -- (25:00) Ras invites Culp to perform his commercial spot for Sand Mountain Truck and Tractor Company -- (25:10) Culp discusses the Sand Mountain Truck and Tractor Company atop of Johnson Brother's String Band backing -- (27:21) Shall We Gather at the River (Johnson Brothers String Band) -- (28:26) Outro break tune [featuring Jesse Culp voiceover] (Johnson Brothers String Band) -- (30:18) Commercial break tune (Ras Johnson) -- (30:37) Culp and Ras joke and say their goodbyes
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: The tape containes the logs of all six recordings of the Johnson's String Band.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Johnson Brothers String Band (Musical group);
